attn_node.name: EQ_L2_FIR
attn_node.bit: H/W Trigger Mechanism at point cache read occurs that detects a CE by ECCCK on RC/CO/SN read. Note: PRD counts the number of these and then will trigger LineDelete.
H/W Trigger Mechanism at point cache read occurs that detects a UE(non SUE) by ECCCK on RC/CO/SN read.
H/W Trigger Mechanism at point cache read occurs that detects a SUE by ECCCK on RC/CO/SN read.
H/W intiated Line Delete occured (Id state injected into the dir) by RC or SN machine.
L2 Castout where L2 cache read detected UE/SUE and Line is M,Mu,T,Tn
L2 Castout where L2 cache read detected UE/SUE and Line is Me,Te,Ten,Sl,S
L2 corrected a CE in the L2 directory
L2 detected a UE in the L2 directory
L2 detected a SBCE in the L2 directory
PEC attempted to repair and CO a SBCE condition but failed(eg CO disp failed). Cache line was lost.
DEPRICATED: THIS FIR BIT SHOULD ALWAYS BE MASKED. Multiple CE/UE deteceted between 2 hang 'early hang' pulse time window
LRU array has illegal valu in it(due to flipped bit)
RC timed out waiting for powerbus to return data.
NCU timed out waiting for powerbus to return data.
Internal h/w control error
All members in a single congruence class has been deleted
Cache Inhibited Ld/St hit a line in the L2 cache. SW error
RC was doing a fabric op on behalf of a load and got an cresp=addr_err
RC was doing a fabric op on behalf of a store and got an cresp=addr_err
RC incoming Power Bus data had a CE error.
RC incoming Power Bus data had a UE error.
RC incoming Power Bus data had a SUE error.
Targetted nodal request got rty_inc cresp.
RC was doing a fabric op on behalf of a load and got an cresp=addr_err for hyp memory
RCDAT read parity error.
CO or SNP was doing a fabric op on behalf of a store and got an cresp=addr_err
LVDIR took a parity error.
bad topology table config software error
Darn timed out waiting for data.
Early hang in L2.
Unexpected cast-out or push during chip_contained mode, maybe also during host-boot before memory available. Mask after host-boot memory ipl.
L2 FIR Register
PEC Phase3 timeout, recoverable problem, information only.
L2 FIR Register
L2 FIR Register
L2 FIR Register
Cache read CE and UE popped within a short hang pulse. Could be a triple bit error.
L2 FIR Register
L2 FIR Register
L2 FIR Register
